emails.subject: Assignment of Exception EXC-101
emails.content:
Dear Arjun,

This email is to inform you that you have been assigned Exception EXC-101 related to the financial audit. Please review the details and take necessary action.

The exception details are as follows:
- Exception ID: EXC-101
- Description: Duplicate Transaction
- Department: Finance
- Division: Accounts Payable

Please acknowledge receipt of this assignment and provide an estimated timeline for resolution.

Regards,
Usman
Audit Department

emails.subject: Re: Assignment of Exception EXC-101
emails.content:
Dear Usman,

I acknowledge receipt of the assignment for Exception EXC-101. I am currently reviewing the details and will provide an update on the resolution timeline shortly.

Thank you for bringing this to my attention.

Regards,
Arjun
Finance
